# STARS CLI

AI-powered Kubernetes monitoring and incident management tool for SREs

## Topics

kubernetes, monitoring, sre, devops, incident-management, on-call, troubleshooting, ai, gemini, cluster-monitoring, kubernetes-cli, kubectl, k8s, site-reliability, observability, crashloop, debugging, rbac, security, audit, mttr, incident-response, automation, diagnostics, alerting, python, cli-tool, devops-tools, kubernetes-tools, sre-tools

## Description

STARS CLI is a production-ready Kubernetes monitoring, incident management, and AI-powered troubleshooting tool designed for Site Reliability Engineers (SREs) and DevOps teams. 

### Key Features:
- Real-time Kubernetes cluster monitoring
- AI-powered diagnostics with Google Gemini
- Incident management with timeline tracking
- Crashloop debugging and auto-fix suggestions
- Blast radius analysis for safe deployments
- RBAC enforcement and security scanning
- Complete audit logging
- Privacy-first with explicit consent

### Use Cases:
- On-call incident response
- Kubernetes troubleshooting
- Cluster health monitoring
- Security auditing
- Deployment safety checks
- MTTR reduction
- Automated diagnostics

### Perfect For:
- Site Reliability Engineers (SREs)
- DevOps Engineers
- Platform Engineers
- Kubernetes Administrators
- On-call Engineers
- Cloud Operations Teams

### Technologies:
- Python 3.9+
- Kubernetes API
- Google Gemini AI
- Prometheus (optional)
- Rich CLI interface

### Installation:
```bash
pip install stars-cli
stars init
```
